name: Putt-Putt® Goes to the Moon
description: Due to a freak accident at the Fireworks Factory, Putt-Putt® is blasted to the moon!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Процессор: 1.0 GHz Processor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 Процессор: 1.5 GHz Processor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Putt Putt goes to the moon is a frightening cautionary tale about the consequences of an unregulated space research program. Countries need to ensure that their space exploration board has the proper funding to enforce all important safety constraints and prevent such incidents happening in the future. I only hope that the politicians and those in charge of space program budgets take heed of such events.
It was a classic. Grew up with this, and had to give it one more play through for good times sake.

I was three when I first played this game and all of the other games by Humongous Entertainment and I am surprised to find out that these games can still be entertaining to me now even though I am much older. I mostly recommend buying this game if you played it when you were younger and want to have a nostalgia trip or if you are a parent with a young kid. These games taught me how to use a computer and were the first games I ever played so they'll always be close to my heart.
Failed the door Puzzle; I won't be on Steam anymore.
Putt-Putt goes to the moon is a must play. Putt Putt is the most relatable character in gaming. If you haven't played this game you are truly a filthy casual.  10/10
i thought this was the new car racing game but it is not
One of my favorite childhood CD-ROMs of all time! I had a great time playing this one again, especially now that I'm old enough for substances that make it a lot more fun.
